amendment.description: Amendment provides States with a model community notification program that they can follow if they choose.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to express the sense of the Congress that states should implement a tier-based notification system for notifying communities when sex offenders are released from jail. The amendment provides states with a model statute when implementing Megan's law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gutknecht amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
